column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I've been here twice so far
column2: both times during the week. Both times there was a 30-40 minute wait so be prepared. Don't leave because of the wait though because they allow you to order your deep dish when you check in. It takes 45-60 minutes to cook
column3: so the wait is almost irrelevant. Would you rather sit down and wait an hour for your pizza or walk around outside and get called in and have a pizza served almost immediately?
